```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(leaflet)
```

## Week 2 Assigment  


This map was created on 28th of June, 2018 as Week-2's assigment for the course **Developing Data Products**, it shows the location of an Ancient Archaeological site in Mesoamerica.   


```{r my_map, echo = FALSE}

content <- paste(sep = "<br/>",
                 "<b><a href='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teotihuacan'>Teotihuac√°n</a></b>",
                 "Place where gods were born",
                 "Sun piramid"
)

t <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircles(lng = -98.845084285, lat = 19.692270590, weight = 1,
             radius = 950) %>%
  addPopups(lng=-98.843555274, lat=19.692270590, content,
            options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE)
  )

t
```
